mapper.insert: insert into trip(place_id, category, theme, title, region_code, city_code, address, postcode, tel, hashtag, introduction, thumbnail, image, latitude, longitude, info) values (#{place_id}, #{category}, #{theme}, #{title}, #{region_code}, #{city_code}, #{address}, #{postcode}, #{tel}, #{hashtag}, #{introduction}, #{thumbnail}, #{image}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{info})
